title: Chat?
body:
Hey i need help.
Yesterday i dragged the ingame chat out to one of the sides in a custom game.
Now I can't get it back to where it was before (Because I can't see it obv.)
 I have alredy tried to uninstall and install the game again, but it won't work
Sooo i can't communicate with my team ingame :i

replies.body:
This can typically be resolved by resetting the config folder that houses the setting for this. Below are the steps to take.

First, you'll want to **log into the game** then hop into **a custom game**. *Alt+Tab* out of the match, then navigate to your installation directory, which should be here:

>**C:\Riot Games\League of Legends**

Delete the folder called **'CONFIG'**

Once you've deleted the folder, leave the match, then hop into another one and confirm the reset went through. Let me know if this resolved it.

It didn't work the first time, but then i tried again.
The chat is back now. Thank you so much! :)
